name: Ghost Tower
description:
This game was made for JF 48H GameJam, enable fullscreen for a smothier gameplay.

Can you survive the ghost waves that are coming to haunt you?

Shoot'em! Smash your mouse button!

If you survive for 5 Waves, you'll be considered the tower master!

Credits
Art, Animation and Audio Design: Welliton Souza
Coding and Game Design by Welliton Souza.
